name: Find A Basic Analysis Kit
description: Obtain a basic laboratory analysis kit for the chemist.

dialogue.describe: I need a basic laboratory analysis kit.
dialogue.offer: I've checked the stock here at this house, and it turns out there's a few pieces of equipment I need.  If you could get me a basic laboratory analysis kit, I'd be grateful.  Heck, I might take some specialty orders for you.
dialogue.advice: One of those old labs might have one.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.success: Wonderful!  I'm sure this will be quite helpful.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll have to find it myself.

name: Find Some Hydrochloric Acid
description: Obtain 25 liters of hydrochloric acid for the chemist.

dialogue.describe: I need 25 liters of hydrochloric acid.
dialogue.offer: My stock of chemicals is getting a bit low at the moment.  Could you get me 25 liters of hydrochloric acid?  I use it in a lot of things, and I'd be willing to pay you however I can.
dialogue.advice: You could find some in a warehouse.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the hydrochloric acid?
dialogue.success: Wonderful!  I'm sure this will be quite helpful.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll have to find it myself.

name: Find Some Gasoline
description: Obtain 200 liters of gasoline for the chemist.
//: Gasoline is absurdly valuble post-apocolypse, and they're asking for a lot of gasoline.

dialogue.offer: I'm in a bit of a spot.  I keep a generator around here to power all my scientific equipment.  It has a bit of gas in it, but I've burned through that; and I can't use most of my tools without power.  This may seem like a lot, but if you could get me 200 liters of gas, I'll pay you back any way I can.
dialogue.advice: One of those old labs might have one.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll have to find it myself.

name: Establish A Trade Route
description: Establish trade relations between the chemist and a refugee center, and bring back a writ of the agreement.

dialogue.offer: I was out scavenging recently, and I found one of those old evac shelters.  Turns out the computer was still on, and had an address for a refugee center.  I think my skills might be useful to them, for medical supplies and whatnot; so I want you to head over there and see if they're interested.  I'd do it myself, but I need to look after this place.
dialogue.advice: It should be pretty simple making the deal, but I'd recommend taking a car over there myself.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: Please?  This is really important to me.
dialogue.inquire: What did they say about it?
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll have to find other customers.
